<jobs>
    <job>
        <title><![CDATA[Datawarehouse Analyst]]></title>
        <description><![CDATA[
  
  About Company:  
  

  
 159 Solutions (an IQVIA company) is a Healthcare consulting firm that delivers a wide range of analytical & technology solutions to Life Sciences clients to help them drive customer value and company results. We leverage our deep industry expertise coupled with thoughtful analysis of data to provide customized solutions that work in the real world. Our most valuable asset is our people—a fact that’s reflected in our values-driven organization in which new perspectives are integral and new ideas are celebrated. 
  

  
 159 Solutions has 150+ people working in Pune, India collaborating with our colleagues in San Mateo serving life sciences companies in US. 
  

  
 
  

  
  Datawarehouse Analyst  
  

  
 Datawarehouse Analyst will analyze data, design & develop ETL pipelines using data manipulation languages like SQL (optionally Python), as part of data warehouse solution implementation. She/he will also work on monitoring Datawarehouse operations/data loads & optimizing ETL processes & validating the accuracy of data after the system is deployed & live for end users. 
  

  
 
  

  
  Key Responsibilities  
  

  

  
+  Coordinate with onshore team and clients to gather & document project requirements 
  

  
+  Contribute to all phases of SDLC including system design & development, quality assurance, UAT and deployment 
  

  
+  Develop fully automated data processing pipelines using SQL & open source tools like Apache Airflow 
  

  
+  Execute SOPs, QC checklists, ETL runbook etc. to monitor & validate regular data loads as part of Datawarehouse system operations 
  

  
+  Execute adhoc data analysis on operational Datawarehouse system to address client queries 
  

  
+  Monitor/Trigger ETL pipelines to refresh data & execute QCs in operational Datawarehouse system before it is released to end users 
  

  
+  Create thorough project documentations, release notes for clients 
  

  
+  Build demos and proof of concepts to support business development for new and existing clients 
  

  
+  Organize knowledge transfer sessions within organization on DWH/ETL tools & technologies 
  

  

  
  Qualifications  
  

  

  
+  Bachelor’s degree in any engineering discipline/science 
  

  
+  0.5-3 years’ experience of developing or operating DWH solutions 
  

  
+  Strong experience of building ETL data processing pipelines using SQL 
  

  
+  Experience building ETL data processing pipelines using Python will be a plus 
  

  
+  Exposure & high-level understanding of at least one cloud platform like AWS, Azure will be a plus 
  

  
+  Experience in Pharma domain will be a plus 
  

  

  
  Individuals should also have the following Personal Skills:  
  

  

  
+  High motivation, strong work ethic and positive attitude 
  

  
+  Strong problem-solving skills 
  

  
+  Quick learner with dedication to continuous learning 
  

  
+  Good communication skills with fluency in English 
  

  
+  Strong interest to learn and experiment with new technologies, create quick PoCs for clients 
  

  
+  Client service orientation with focus on quality and detail 
  

  
+  Excellent task management skills 
  

  
+  Ability to work across global cross-office teams 
  

  

  
 159 Solutions offers a competitive compensation package with salary and bonus incentives, plus an attractive benefits package.

    <job>
        <title><![CDATA[Datawarehouse Consultant]]></title>
        <description><![CDATA[
  
  About Company:  
  

  
 159 Solutions (an IQVIA company) is a Healthcare consulting firm that delivers a wide range of analytical & technology solutions to Life Sciences clients to help them drive customer value and company results. We leverage our deep industry expertise coupled with thoughtful analysis of data to provide customized solutions that work in the real world. Our most valuable asset is our people—a fact that’s reflected in our values-driven organization in which new perspectives are integral and new ideas are celebrated. 
  

  
 159 Solutions has 150+ people working in Pune, India collaborating with our colleagues in San Mateo, to serve life sciences companies in US. 
  

  
 
  

  
  Datawarehouse Consultant  
  

  
 Datawarehouse Consultant will lead a team of analysts/developers to design & develop data warehouse solutions in the cloud by working closely with our US/India team members and vendors. The candidate will also be responsible to lead Datawarehouse operations after the system is deployed & live for end users. She/he will also play an integral role in enhancing 159’s capabilities in this space. 
  

  
 
  

  
  Key Responsibilities  
  

  

  
+  Design & build end-to-end Datawarehouse solutions using latest open source and cloud-based technologies 
  

  
+  Work closely with offshore manager, onshore team, client’s business and IT stakeholders to gather project requirements 
  

  
+  Collaborate with India and US senior consultants/managers to design DWH solutions & ETL processes 
  

  
+  Create SOPs, QC checklists, ETL runbook etc. to drive regular Datawarehouse system operations 
  

  
+  Discuss & execute adhoc data analysis on operational Datawarehouse system to address client queries 
  

  
+  Lead a team of analysts to refresh data & execute QCs in operational Datawarehouse system before the system is released to end users 
  

  
+  Lead a team of analysts & manage their work and contribute to project planning, system design & development, quality assurance, UAT and deployment activities 
  

  
+  Build demos and POCs to support business development for new and existing clients 
  

  
+  Coach & mentor analysts/developers to build skills in SQL, ETL, Python (optional) and BI visualizations/reporting (optional) 
  

  
+  Organize training sessions for analysts and nurture their growth 
  

  
+  Lead creation of PowerPoint decks and online visualization (e.g. Tableau, Sisense etc.) to communicate results to client and internal teams 
  

  

  
 
  

  
  Qualifications  
  

  

  
+  Bachelor’s degree in any engineering discipline/science 
  

  
+  3-6 years of prior work experience designing, developing and/or operating data warehouse & BI solutions 
  

  
+  Strong experience of designing & building ETL pipelines using SQL. Exposure & high-level understanding of using Python for building ETL pipelines will be a plus. 
  

  
+  Exposure & high-level understanding of at least one cloud platform like AWS or Azure will be a plus 
  

  
+  Exposure to BI and visualization tools like Tableau etc. will be a plus 
  

  
+  Experience in Pharma domain will be a plus 
  

  

  
 
  

  
  Individuals should also have the following Personal Skills:  
  

  

  
+  Client service orientation with acute focus on quality 
  

  
+  Excellent communication skills with fluency in English 
  

  
+  Strong problem-solving skills 
  

  
+  High motivation, strong work-ethic and positive attitude 
  

  
+  Quick learner with dedication to continuous learning 
  

  
+  Strong interest to learn and experiment with new technologies, create quick POCs for clients 
  

  
+  Ability to work across global cross-office teams 
  

  

  
 
  

  
 159 Solutions offers a competitive compensation package with salary and bonus incentives, plus an attractive benefits package.

    <job>
        <title><![CDATA[Analytics Associate Consultant]]></title>
        <description><![CDATA[
  
  About Company:  
  

  
 159 Solutions (an IQVIA company) is a Healthcare consulting firm that delivers a wide range of analytical solutions to Life Sciences clients to help them drive customer value and company results. We leverage our deep industry expertise coupled with thoughtful data analysis to provide customized solutions that work in the real world. We believe in delighting our customers and greatly value our people, their perspectives and new ideas.  
  

  
 
  

  
 159 Solutions has 100+ talented and motivated people working in Pune, India collaborating with our colleagues in San Mateo, CA serving life sciences companies in US. 
  

  
 
  

  
  Analytics Consultant  
  

  
 Analytics Consultants work with on-shore team and India managers to create custom solutions by leveraging disparate data sources to support sales and marketing decisions. Consultants will be responsible for substantial portion of analyses from problem formulation to solution creation and e
